title: Public Information Act Request - Face Recognition System Access

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Any datasets, logs, or lists showing the law enforcement agencies with access to the Texas Department of Public Safety’s face recognition system (“FRS”) or with the ability to request searches of the FRS from January 1, 2020 to the date of the most recently available data.  If the Department maintains this information in an Excel spreadsheet, I request that the record be produced in this format. If datasets, logs or lists are not available, please provide all available agreements with agencies that have access to the FRS, including all Memoranda of Understanding (MOUs) or other agreements with federal, state or local law enforcement agencies. 

2. Any datasets, logs, or lists showing which agencies requested access and which agencies received access to the FRS from January 1, 2020 to the date of the most recently available data. Please provide all data and records of queries and requests for face recognition comparisons, including, as available, the requesting organization, the number of requests made, and the number of requests granted.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Paul Tepper

title: NYS FOIL: Building Ambassador and Quality Remote Training

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all documents and communications, including but not limited to emails from NYSED, containing any reference to building ambassadors and/or building-level ambassadors and/or Quality Remote Training and/or QRT within the past 18 months.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Douglas Lloyd

title: CCW Applicant list (with last names redacted)

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: CCW Applicant list (with last names redacted)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am seeking  a current list of all pending applications for CCW permits in Contra Costa County, including the current status of completion.  Please include first name of applicant, date the application was received,  current step the application is in the process (pending livescan, pending interview, pending range time)

If the first name is considered private information, it can be redacted to the initial of the first name.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jerry
